title: Puma
description: Puma is a globally recognized sportswear brand, known for its dynamic use of bold colors. The color palette comprises of black (000000), a range of muted grays (44403F, 696965), and vibrant red (BA2026) complemented by a subtle tan (AE946D). These colors are documented in the official Puma Brand Guidelines sourced from Mariastegemeyerâ€™s WordPress site.
